definition: a transparent optical device used to converge or diverge transmitted light and to form images
details:
noun
- a transparent optical device used to converge or diverge transmitted light and to form images
= synonyms: lense
- electronic equipment that uses a magnetic or electric field in order to focus a beam of electrons
= synonyms: electron lens
- biconvex transparent body situated behind the iris in the eye
= synonyms: crystalline lens, lens of the eye
- (metaphor) a channel through which something can be seen or understood
= example: (metaphor) a channel through which something can be seen or understood
